string-array.name: push_til
string-array.item: Warm flutter when you remember my favorite snack
Nervous thrill before our first group date
Gentle sadness as you donate your old guitar
Bright pride when you help a neighbor fix a fence
Warm fuzz when you laugh at my mimicry
"Tight worry when you're out in a heatwave"
Sweet nostalgia revisiting our first picnic spot
Giddy excitement planning our game night
Tender tears during your award acceptance speech
Warm glow when you quote my favorite poem
Restless anticipation for your pottery class
Soft shame after forgetting our walk plans
Light joy when our cats curl up together
Deep calm while stargazing beside you
Bright spark when you suggest a bookstore trip
Tight knot of anxiety before your art exhibition
Warm rush when you mention me to your friends
Gentle sadness sorting your old sports trophies
Sharp pang seeing your childhood report cards
Light flutter when you wear my scarf
Deep gratitude for your help with moving
Nervous bounce before our road trip
Warm glow at your homemade holiday gift
Tight squeeze of joy at your competition win
Soft ache when you miss our weekly walk
Bright hope in your "we'll try" promise
Warm fuzz when you laugh at my silly impressions
Heavy weight of guilt after a thoughtless action
Light spark when you borrow my recipe book
Calm settle when you read to me before bed
Bright thrill at your "I got us museum tickets" news
Tight worry when you hike a steep trail
Warm memory of your first "I'm glad we met"
